basics.name: Joko Liber
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Hey, I’m Joko Liber Servacius Banjarnahor (yes, my name is longer than most Java methods), a Software Engineer from Indonesia who loves turning caffeine into code. My journey into tech started back in 2008 when I discovered the magical world of custom AIMP3 themes and spent way too much time playing Alien Shooter on my school’s computer (sorry, teachers, I was “researching” game mechanics). Turns out, hacking themes and blasting aliens make me more curious about computers than I ever expected—who knew? When I’m not saving the world one line of code at a time, I working on my little and funny project, slay virtual dragons in video games, dive into books (mostly to figure out why my code doesn’t work and try to figure out live), and occasionally channel my inner Picasso to create digital art.

work.name: Endless Knot
responsibilities: Developed a forum web application and a CMS for Surfvote Web in collaboration with the Polimill team, enhancing content management and user experience.
Worked with the GAOGAO team to build two Startup Loan Diagnosis applications, including a CMS. Utilized Laravel, Vue.js, and Next.js to create scalable, efficient, and user-friendly solutions.

work.name: PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk.
responsibilities: Contributed to the development of an Identity Access Management (IAM) system, integrating internal applications and ensuring seamless authentication and authorization. Maintained IAM services and servers to enhance security, scalability, and system reliability.
achievements: Successfully integrating applications to our core IAM system, improving security measures.

work.name: Ralali.com
responsibilities: Collaborated with designers, QA engineers, and business stakeholders to develop, document, and maintain a robust billing system.
Help the development and optimization of internal operational applications using PHP, Golang, and JavaScript, improving efficiency and scalability.

work.name: Cartenz Technology
responsibilities: Worked with designers, QA engineers, and business stakeholders to develop, document, and maintain a Smart Government Application utilizing PHP (Laravel Framework) and JavaScript.
Managed and optimized legacy systems, including a tax service used in Badung, built with Java (Play Framework) and SQL, ensuring stability and efficiency

work.name: PT Anabatic Technologies Tbk
responsibilities: Collaborated with a team to develop a Core Banking Application for interbank transactions using the Spring Framework (Java) for the backend and Angular for the frontend.
Conducted research and documentation on high-availability tools to enhance system reliability and performance.

work.name: Microsoft
responsibilities: Mentored and guide students in technology-related disciplines as part of the MSP program, equipping them with industry-relevant skills beyond traditional academia.
Provided training on Microsoft technologies to enhance students' employability and career readiness

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio V2
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.
highlights: Built with Astro as a web framework and Tailwind CSS

projects.name: AI-Music Recomendation
projects.description: Engineered a recommendation system using Spotify API and Gemini AI to map user preferences to music genres and moods.
highlights: Built with Python, Spotify API and Gemini AI API.

projects.name: arch_bytes
projects.description: Created an AI-powered platform for generating software architecture quizzes and bite-sized information, adopted by developer to refine system design skills. (note: api and website)
highlights: Built with Python, Spotify API and Gemini AI API.

projects.name: nodejs_boilerplate
projects.description: Boilerplate that using Express.js as the framework that build on top of Node.js.
highlights: Developed a production-ready REST API template with authentication and PostgreSQL integration, used as a foundation for rapid project onboarding.
